events.name: EV battery supply chain
events.wd_description: The EV battery supply chain encompasses all activities from mining raw materials to manufacturing batteries and end goods for consumers, involving multiple stages and participants across the globe.
events.description: The EV battery supply chain encompasses all activities from mining raw materials to manufacturing batteries and end goods for consumers, involving multiple stages and participants across the globe.

events.name: Upstream activities
events.wd_description: Upstream activities involve mining for essential raw materials such as cobalt, lithium, nickel, manganese, graphite, and other minerals like copper.
events.description: Upstream activities involve mining for essential raw materials such as cobalt, lithium, nickel, manganese, graphite, and other minerals like copper.

events.name: Midstream activities
events.wd_description: Midstream activities include refining and smelting of raw mineral ores to produce high-purity materials required for batteries, as well as the manufacture of cathodes and anodes.
events.description: Midstream activities include refining and smelting of raw mineral ores to produce high-purity materials required for batteries, as well as the manufacture of cathodes and anodes.

events.name: ining and smelting
events.wd_description: Refining and smelting involve heat or chemical treatment to achieve high-purity materials, with lower environmental impacts achieved through decarbonized electricity, automated process control, exhaust gas cleaning, and recycling used electrolytes.
events.description: Refining and smelting involve heat or chemical treatment to achieve high-purity materials, with lower environmental impacts achieved through decarbonized electricity, automated process control, exhaust gas cleaning, and recycling used electrolytes.

events.name: hode manufacturing
events.wd_description: The process of creating cathodes for battery cells, which are essential components in the battery manufacturing process.
events.description: The process of creating cathodes for battery cells, which are essential components in the battery manufacturing process.

events.name: de manufacturing
events.wd_description: The process of creating anodes for battery cells, which are crucial for the functioning of batteries.
events.description: The process of creating anodes for battery cells, which are crucial for the functioning of batteries.

events.name: Downstream activities
events.wd_description: Downstream activities involve the manufacturing of batteries and end goods for consumers, with variations in emissions based on the energy mix of the production location.
events.description: Downstream activities involve the manufacturing of batteries and end goods for consumers, with variations in emissions based on the energy mix of the production location.

events.name: Supply chain risks
events.wd_description: The EV battery supply chain faces various risks, including sustainability challenges, political instability, corruption, human rights concerns, environmental justice issues, extreme weather events, geopolitical issues, international trade regulation, corporate consolidation, and rapidly changing technologies.
events.description: The EV battery supply chain faces various risks, including sustainability challenges, political instability, corruption, human rights concerns, environmental justice issues, extreme weather events, geopolitical issues, international trade regulation, corporate consolidation, and rapidly changing technologies.

events.name: tainability challenges
events.wd_description: Challenges in ensuring sustainable practices in the extraction and processing of raw materials for EV batteries.
events.description: Challenges in ensuring sustainable practices in the extraction and processing of raw materials for EV batteries.

events.name: itical instability
events.wd_description: Political instability in countries with significant mineral deposits poses risks to the supply chain.
events.description: Political instability in countries with significant mineral deposits poses risks to the supply chain.

events.name: ruption
events.wd_description: Corruption in the mining and processing of raw materials can disrupt the supply chain.
events.description: Corruption in the mining and processing of raw materials can disrupt the supply chain.

events.name: an rights concerns
events.wd_description: Concerns over human rights violations in the extraction of raw materials for EV batteries.
events.description: Concerns over human rights violations in the extraction of raw materials for EV batteries.

events.name: ironmental justice issues
events.wd_description: Environmental justice issues related to the extraction and processing of raw materials for EV batteries.
events.description: Environmental justice issues related to the extraction and processing of raw materials for EV batteries.

events.name: reme weather events
events.wd_description: Extreme weather events affecting the extraction and transportation of raw materials.
events.description: Extreme weather events affecting the extraction and transportation of raw materials.

events.name: political issues
events.wd_description: Geopolitical issues impacting the availability and cost of raw materials for EV batteries.
events.description: Geopolitical issues impacting the availability and cost of raw materials for EV batteries.

events.name: ernational trade regulation
events.wd_description: International trade regulations affecting the flow of raw materials for EV batteries.
events.description: International trade regulations affecting the flow of raw materials for EV batteries.

events.name: porate consolidation
events.wd_description: Consolidation of supply chain companies into a few large corporations, impacting competition and supply chain resilience.
events.description: Consolidation of supply chain companies into a few large corporations, impacting competition and supply chain resilience.

events.name: idly changing technologies
events.wd_description: The impact of rapidly changing technologies on the supply chain for EV batteries.
events.description: The impact of rapidly changing technologies on the supply chain for EV batteries.
